caption.title: The correlation between Aedes aegypti infestation risk (LIRAa) and arboviruses incidence in the year 2016.
caption.p: The number of municipalities at high risk of A. aegypti infestation, per Brazil Federal Unit, versus incidence of dengue (A), chikungunya (B) and Zika (C). Linear correlation was considered significant when P<0.05.
Click here for additional data file.
